entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
